snippet: An online T-shirt retailer offered his customers a Groupon deal last year of a $20 coupon good for $40 worth of merchandise. But few of those who bought the coupon spent much more than its $40 value.
lead_paragraph: An online T-shirt retailer offered his customers a Groupon deal last year of a $20 coupon good for $40 worth of merchandise. But few of those who bought the coupon spent much more than its $40 value.
